error.title: Legacy knob types
error.description:
## Knobs are in obsolete configuration
Settings needs to be fixed.
### How to repair?
Contact your supervisor or fix it in project settings at 'project_settings/nuke/imageio/nodes/required_nodes' at knobs. Each '__legacy__' type has to be defined accordingly to its type.
